text: The rebel yell was a battle cry used by Confederate soldiers during the American Civil War. Rebel yell can also refer to: * Rebel Yell (whiskey), a whiskey brand introduced in 1936 * Rebel Yell (roller coaster), a roller coaster premiering in 1975 at Kings Dominion near Richmond, Virginia * Rebel Yell (album), a 1983 album by Billy Idol **"Rebel Yell" (song), the title track of the 1983 Billy Idol album * Rebel Yell, a 2009 novel by Alice Randall.
title: Rebel yell (disambiguation)
